Articles.Content:
I used a bunch of parts, most from the intrepid series, to build this Ares I-X rocket. It makes a 100km extremely quickly and efficiently and the command and service modules look great when they deploy.

If you guys want the rocket enough, I will compile a zip archive available for .craft download.

Here is the actual rocket.

> ![index.php?action=dlattach;topic=13103.0;attach=21063;image](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=13103.0;attach=21063;image)

Second stage just after completing the cirularization burn.

> ![index.php?action=dlattach;topic=13103.0;attach=21065;image](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=13103.0;attach=21065;image)

Last but not least, the CSM in orbit.

> ![index.php?action=dlattach;topic=13103.0;attach=21067;image](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=13103.0;attach=21067;image)

*Because some people might have a huge urge to complain about everything, I will make this statement in bold with a high fontsize.***I DID NOT MODEL THESE PARTS. I AM SIMPLY PUTTING THEM IN TO THE SAME DOWNLOAD AS THE CRAFT PACK TO MAKE THINGS EASIER TO THOSE WHO WANT THIS ROCKET.**

**DOWNLOAD THIS CRAFT**

This dropbox link includes all of the parts used, the Mechjeb plug in (I had two identical and wasn\'t sure which one it was. Just use them both), and the .craft file.

You should be able to just load the .craft at the launch pad and not have to build this at all.

[https://dl.dropbox.com/u/76061308/Ares%20IX%20Rocket%20DOWNLOAD.zip](https://dl.dropbox.com/u/76061308/Ares%20IX%20Rocket%20DOWNLOAD.zip)

*Parts came from IFE intrepid series, Down Under Parts Pack, Stock Parts, NukaKorp Korion Command Pod series... All links will be provided at my soonest ability. These can also be found through a simple search on the forums.*
Nice recreation Vincent! It looks great and that Orion CSM is perfect. Where did you get the parts from? Did you model any yourself?
No. I got them all from various parts packs I downloaded.

Hmm, if enough people want it,

WANT WANT WANT WANT WANT. ;P
OK. I shall put together the zip now.
ARES-IX ROCKET NOW AVAILABLE FOR DOWNLOAD.
Your really shouldn\'t be uploading parts that are not yours; just link the community to the parts packs.

I already specifically stated they weren\'t my parts. I\'m only putting them together in a pack to organize things. Why should I tell people they can download my craft and then make them download all the parts? There\'s a reason the author made the parts available to the public.
Keep the pack together just state which packs the parts came from along with links to there threads. That should be more than enough credit right there.
